content: I asked about this in #rust-toolchain (#rust-toolchain > hello world with interface types?) but this stream might be more relevant. My goal is playing around with interface types using a higher level language than WAT. Thanks!

You may find witx-bindgen of interest; that's where a lot of the current development focus is.

GitHub - bytecodealliance/witx-bindgen: A language binding generator for `witx` (a precursor to WebAssembly interface types)
